Summary: 4 or 5 very separate circle lights in somewhat of a inverted V formation
divs: Sighting DetailsMy mom and I had just left her house and it was almost dark but still some light dusk and I was driving and I said what's that my mom said what and I said up there and pointed and she said what and I pointed again up into the sky and I said it looks like a ufo and the formation seemed to be changing and I watched it just seemingly disappear. I have never said look there's a ufo or anything like that before. I was shocked when the 10 oclock news said it was going to have a ufo sighting on it and stayed up to watch I thought it was what I had seen and I even called my mom to tell her to watch. It wasn't talking about my sighting it was about others. I was disappointed. I wonder if anyone else saw it.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were 8 other sightings in San Diego on or around February 27th 2008
